cards.name: Master Thief
cards.card-text: If this card is destroyed, you may pick a non-tactic card in your opponent's discard pile. If you do, put it into play under your control.
cards.flavor: getting there is easy; getting away is the trick

cards.name: Mendacious Brigand
cards.card-text: If this card is blocked, you may pick a blocking character and a character your opponent controls that is not in a battle. If you do, remove the blocking character from the battle and add the other character to the blocking party.
cards.flavor: love of my life, breathe deep the sweet perfume

cards.name: Mercenary's Creed
cards.card-text:
ATTACH to Character

BRIBE
COST: Both players may use this ability. Pay 3.
EFFECT: Take control of the attached character.

BLACKMAIL
COST: Use this only if you own this card. Pay 2.
EFFECT: Take control of the attached character.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Chris de Joya

cards.name: Misappropriation Machine
cards.card-text:
STEAL
COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character or item in your opponent's discard pile.
EFFECT: Put the character or item into play under your control. Your opponent takes control of this card.
cards.flavor: we've got theftbots, pilfermajigs… ...and even a dusty old yoinkmotron.

cards.name: Orgy Den Smoke Out
cards.card-text: Your opponent discards a card at random. Put the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard pile.
cards.flavor: gold and finery, just slightly soiled

cards.name: Poisoned Blade
cards.card-text:
ATTACH to Character

If the attached character inflicts damage to a character, destroy the damaged character.

HANDOFF
COST: Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.
cards.flavor: looks good enough to eat “Would you mind dipping those apples as well?”

cards.name: Recreant Cad
cards.card-text:
SNEAK
COST: Use this only if your opponent has at least 10 cards in their discard pile. Pay 1. Remove 2 cards in your opponent’s discard pile from the game.
EFFECT: This turn, this card gains Covert.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Silvia Gunarso

cards.name: Throatstabber
cards.card-text: When this card enters play, flip a coin. If you lose, deplete this card.
cards.flavor: oh, i'm sorry…were you saying something?

cards.name: Two-Headed Coin
cards.card-text: If you lose a coin flip, you may shuffle this card into your deck. If you do, reflip that coin and draw a card instead.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by FangWei “78 in a row. A new record, I imagine.”

cards.name: Unexpected Boobysnake
cards.card-text: You may play this card whenever you could play a tactic. If you do, when this card enters play discard a card or destroy this card.
cards.flavor: nobody expects the unexpected boobysnake!

cards.name: Wild Boars
cards.card-text: While this card is the only member of an attacking party, only characters with at least X speed can block it, where X is this card's speed.
cards.flavor: freshly summoned from the abyss ·"We should have ordered the chicken!·

cards.name: Anxious Oaf
cards.card-text: When an attacking or blocking party is formed  including this card, it must have at least 2 members.
cards.flavor: BUH-NEE! ·"Castle Direstock? Most people never even make it past the rabbits.·

cards.name: Assimilation Center
cards.card-text:
·"RECRUIT"
COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Search your deck for a character and reveal it. Put it on the top of your deck.
cards.flavor: these are lost drunken men who don't care ·"And these are lost drunken men who do care! And these are men who aren't lost and care, but don't drink.·

cards.name: Barbaric Rifleman
cards.card-text: When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to your opponent's faction.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Zi Jian Zi Jian's tears can cure cancer. Too bad he's never cried.

cards.name: Battle Surge
cards.card-text: This turn, all your characters gain 1 strength.
cards.flavor: unleash the killer in you Its smell alone can drive sane men into a murderous frenzy.

cards.name: Blow Up
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick an item.

EFFECT: Destroy the item. Your opponent's faction loses 3 influence.
cards.flavor: i make boom

cards.name: Brash Basher
cards.flavor: he's in over *your* head ·"…we're going to Clockman, and Blightmore, and Marmothoa, and then we're going to go to Castle Direstock and we're gonna take back the YYYEEEEAAAAAAARRRRRGGGGGHHHH!!!!·

cards.name: Callow Liegeman
cards.card-text: If this card attacks in a party with more than 1 member, it gains 1 strength and 1 life this turn.
cards.flavor: hazing?  do your worst. You know if you stab a man in the dead of winter, steam will rise up from the wounds.

cards.name: Deadly Striker
cards.card-text: If this card is destroyed, your opponent's faction loses 4 influence.
cards.flavor:
rock you like a hurricane Dear Sir or Madam:

The Imperial Army regrets to inform you that your son(s) are dead because they got blowed up. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Best wishes,
Praxis, Grand General of Bad Death Stuff

cards.name: Dethmurderbludgeon, the Craghammer
cards.card-text:
UNIQUE Dethmürderblüdgeon

ATTACH to Character

The attached character gains 2 strength and 2 life.

If the attached character is blocked, your opponent's faction loses 2 influence.

If the attached character inflicts damage to a faction, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 2 damage to it.

If this card is put into a discard pile from play, put it into its owner’s hand instead.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Patrick Meehan

cards.name: Distraction
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a character.

EFFECT: Deplete the character.
cards.flavor: ohh noes!!!!1 “I keep an extra severed head handy for just such an occasion…”

cards.name: Elbow Dropper
cards.card-text:
OFF THE TOP ROPE
COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character cannot block.
cards.flavor: i can't believe it!  that's gotta hurt! ·"Illegal, Mean Jean!·

cards.name: Explosive Fury
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Destroy it. Pick another character.

EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Patrick Meehan We really wish Patrick Meehan would wear pants in the office. Any pants. We've tried asking him nicely, but he won't listen. And frankly, we're tired of getting poked in the eye.

cards.name: Fleshripping Scenepuller
cards.card-text: If this card is blocked, this turn it gains 4 strength for each member in the opposing party.
cards.flavor: his face?  i didn't like it. He'll beat you to death, eat your flesh, and sew your skin into his clothing. And if you're very, very lucky, he'll do it in that order.

cards.name: Gore Engine
cards.card-text:
If a character is destroyed during a turn when this card damaged it, put X tokens on this card, where X is the strength of that character.

This card gains 1 strength for each token on it.

IMPALE
COST: Pay 2 or remove 2 tokens from this card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character must block this card if it can.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Ivan Ng

cards.name: Infuriator
cards.card-text: When this card enters play, all your characters gain 1 strength this turn.
cards.flavor: strong words from a strong man ·"...and your big ugly face is as dumb as a butt!·

cards.name: Lieutenant General
cards.card-text: If an attacking party is formed including this character, all other "soldier" characters in that party gain 1 life this turn.
cards.flavor: it is good to be loved. it is better to be feared. “There is no avoiding war; it can only be postponed to the advantage of others.”

cards.name: Morale Officer
cards.card-text:
CONVINCE
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: This turn, all your "soldier" characters gain 1 strength.
cards.flavor: brings out the best in his men ·"And when we're done, I have no doubt you'll embrace the good and truth of our cause.·

cards.name: Murderous Commander
cards.card-text:
CUNNING PLAN
COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to your opponent's faction.
cards.flavor: next! ·"You see killmajigs have a preset kill limit. Knowing their weakness, I sent wave after wave of my own men at them...until they reached their limit and shut down.·

cards.name: Needless Beating
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a character.

EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character. If your opponent's faction has 15 influence or less, inflict 1 additional damage to the character. If your opponent's faction has 10 influence or less, inflict 1 damage to each character your opponent controls. If your opponent's faction has 5 influence or less, draw a card.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Silvia Gunarso

cards.name: Penetrate
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick an attacking character you control.

EFFECT: If the character assigns battle damage to the blocking party during this battle, assign it to the target of the attack instead.
cards.flavor: sometimes a ram is just a ram

cards.name: Pinch
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a character.

EFFECT: Inflict 1 damage to the character.
cards.flavor: i peench Maybe just a little peench?

cards.name: Really Big Barduse
cards.card-text:
COST: You may pick 2 or fewer characters. 

When this card enters play, if you picked characters as part of its cost, inflict up to 5 damage divided however you want to those characters.
cards.flavor: i didn't know you played the ass-trombone! ·"It's not the random devouring that bothers me. It's the way he plays with them first.·

cards.name: Ruthless Platoon
cards.card-text:
CANNIBALIZE
COST: Destroy a character you control.
EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 2 strength.
cards.flavor: Bob was tasty for a thin guy ·"You know most people overlook it, but there's a lot of good meat on the face.·

cards.name: Sadistic Colonel
cards.card-text: If your opponent plays a tactic, inflict 2 damage to their faction.
cards.flavor: eeny, meeny, miney, moe Colonel Blastwad always makes inspection a lot of fun!

cards.name: Skin Suit
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Pick a character your opponent controls. Y is its strength.

EFFECT: Inflict X damage to your opponent's character and Y damage to your character simultaneously. If only 1 of the characters is destroyed by this damage, remove it from the game instead. The surviving character gains all rules text of the removed character.
cards.flavor: wear it while it’s wet

cards.name: Splattergun
cards.card-text:
UNLOAD
COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character or faction.
EFFECT: Inflict 3 damage to the character or faction. Your opponent takes control of this card.
cards.flavor: the room looks better in red

cards.name: Suicide Squad
cards.card-text:
ULTIMATE SACRIFICE
COST: X is this card's strength. Destroy this card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character.
cards.flavor: perhaps today is a good day to die! ·"...prepare for ramming speed!·

cards.name: Swordchucks
cards.card-text:
ATTACH to Character

The attached character gains 4 strength.

If damage is inflicted to the attached character, increase the amount by 2.

HANDOFF
COST: Pay 3. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.
cards.flavor: i know you’re angry, but don’t lose your head

cards.name: Thundering Nilpha
cards.card-text: While this card is attacking a location, it gains 1 strength and cannot be blocked.
cards.flavor:
crushing coils of carnage Smashed into pulp, dashed to bloody ribbons on the rocks, spined and impaled, devoured and ingested, boiled alive in the churning belly of the demon.

Good times.

cards.name: Torrential Bleeder
cards.card-text: At the start of your turn, inflict 1 damage to all characters.
cards.flavor: let the death shower begin! ·"Damn you bleedy buggers! Damn you to hell!·

cards.name: Trip Wire
cards.card-text:
COST: Play this only while you are being attacked.

EFFECT: Inflict up to 3 damage divided however you want to the attacking characters.
cards.flavor: always good for a chuckle

cards.name: Trophy Collector
cards.card-text: COST: Play this only if your opponent's faction has 10 influence or less.
cards.flavor: limited edition artwork by Zi Jian We always wondered about those veiny, dried up hot dogs Zi Jian brings for lunch.

cards.name: Wyrmfang Deathskull
cards.card-text:
UNIQUE Wyrmfang

If you attack, your opponent picks any number of characters they control. Those characters must block during this battle if they can, and only those characters can block.
cards.flavor: who lives in a pineapple under the sea? WYRM-FANG-DEATH-SKULL!

set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/Concentriculation.jpg
cards.name: Concentriculation
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a non-resource card.

EFFECT: Put the card on the top of its owner's deck.

RECUR: [O][O][O]
COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 3. Pick a character. Remove this card from the game.
EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: on the frontier of focus Take a picture, it'll last longer!

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/LugubrianPoacher.jpg
cards.name: Lugubrian Poacher
cards.card-text: If this card restores, it gains COVERT this turn.
cards.flavor: hoarse hunter of horrors The wastelands of Lugubria were never hospitable, but decades of voidal pollution have made them host to many dangerous monsters. In a strange twist, the arcanists have begun to find uses for these beasts and will pay bounties to anyone foolish enough to pursue them. He who fights with monsters might take care lest he thereby become a monster.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/OfficiallyOffensiveOverseer.jpg
cards.name: Officially Offensive Overseer
cards.card-text:
COST: If you control at least [O][O][O], you may pick a character with strength 3 or less or a location with structure 3 or less.

When this card enters play, if you picked a character or location as part of its cost, put that card into its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: more offensive than official but less officious than offensive.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/ViolatingRitual.jpg
cards.name: Violating Ritual
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick an opponent.

EFFECT: That opponent discards 2 cards. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: this may sting a little

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/AudaciousAppraisal.jpg
cards.name: Audacious Appraisal
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a character.

EFFECT: Your opponent chooses a number for X. Choose one: Your opponent's faction loses X influence, or destroy the picked character and your faction loses X+X influence.
cards.flavor: whatever the market will bear Buy when it whines, sell when it roars.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/MauStrategist.jpg
cards.name: Mau Strategist
cards.card-text:
When this card enters play, you may search your deck for a staple resource, reveal it, and put it into your hand. 

If this card is destroyed, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: conniving and cunning Always looking for the next task to increase his own bank account. He will risk it all just for a little more profit, even if “it all”, isn’t his ‘it all” to risk.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/MushroomMerchant.jpg
cards.name: Mushroom Merchant
cards.card-text: When this card enters play, you may pick a character. If you do, this turn, that character gains 2 life.
cards.flavor: it's dangerous to go alone, take this Buy something, will ya?

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/NegotiationCeremonies.jpg
cards.name: Negotiation Ceremonies
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick an opponent. You may pay 1. If you do, that opponent may pay 1. Repeat this cost until you or your opponent does not pay.

EFFECT: Each player draws cards equal to the amount they paid.
cards.flavor:
more talking than I care to discuss “Ten.” “Sixty.” “Twenty.” “Forty five.”
“Thirty two and three quarters.”
“Thirty six and not a micromajig less.”
“Thirty three and I’ll toss in my grandmother’s corpse.”
“Isn’t she alive?”
“Presently.”

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/5n4p.jpg
cards.name: 5n4p
cards.card-text: If this card is restored, put a Micromajig token into play under your control.
cards.flavor: 50 M4ny M4j195! If we could build enough of these, we might just be able to sneak out of this place!

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/Elitistmajig.jpg
cards.name: Elitistmajig
cards.card-text:
CRUNCH
COST: Destroy a Micromajig token you control.
EFFECT: This turn, this card gains " PROVIDES: [E][E][E] ".

[E][E][E][E][E][E]: This card gains 2 strength and 2 life.
cards.flavor: above the fray Be the 1%.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/MicromajigRecyclingStation.jpg
cards.name: Micromajig Recycling Station
cards.card-text: At the start of your turn, you may choose a number for X and destroy X micromajigs you control. If you do, reduce the next numeric cost you pay this turn by X+1.
cards.flavor: preserving Lugubria for a better tomorrow This product made with at least 60% post-consumer majig parts.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/SockemBot.jpg
cards.name: Sockem Bot
cards.card-text:
PAY OFF
COST: Any player may use this ability. Pay 1.
EFFECT: This turn, if damage is inflicted to a character or faction by this card, reduce the amount by 1.
cards.flavor: arch nemesis of rockem bot

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/BackdoorBrigand.jpg
cards.name: Backdoor Brigand
cards.card-text:
EXIT STAGE RIGHT
COST: Only use this ability if this card has not assigned damage this turn. Pay 1.
EFFECT: Flip this card face-down under its owner's control.

FLIP UP: 3 [D][D]
cards.flavor: screw you guys, I'm going home Look! Over there! A distraction!

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/BananaPeel.jpg
cards.name: Banana Peel
cards.card-text:
TACTICAL

COST: If you played this card using TACTICAL you may pay 1. If you don't, terminate it.

SLIP
COST: Pick an attacking character. Destroy this card.
EFFECT: Flip that card face-down under its owner's control. Draw a card.

FLIP UP: 3 [D][D][D]
cards.flavor: surprisingly effective against giants too!

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/Numba1Stunna!.jpg
cards.name: Numba 1 Stunna!
cards.card-text:
TACTICAL

If this card inflicts damage to a character, that character does not restore during its controller's next RESTORE RULE.

FLIP UP: 3 [D][D]
cards.flavor: prize fighter. literally.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/CicibeotheSwift.jpg
cards.name: Cicibeo the Swift
cards.card-text:
UNIQUE CICIBEO

TACTICAL

COST: Discard a non-resource Rogue card from your hand.

[D][D][D][D][D][D]: If another "cicibeo" card enters play from your hand, you may pick a character and take control of it.
cards.flavor: deft hands, swift feet Excellent dancer, better pickpocket.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/B.A.S.E.Jump.jpg
cards.name: B.A.S.E. Jump
cards.card-text:
COST: Pick a location. Pick a character.

EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character, where X is the location's structure. Draw a card.

FLIP UP: 3 [R]
cards.flavor: Geronimo! You do not need a parachute to B.A.S.E. Jump. You only need a parachute to B.A.S.E. Jump twice.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/RushingCrushingBlockhead.jpg
cards.name: Rushing Crushing Blockhead
cards.card-text:
If this card inflicts damage to a faction, destroy this card. 

This character cannot block.

[R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card loses all other rules text and loses 1 speed.
cards.flavor: you are the brute squad Berserkers are not well-known for their creative problem-solving.

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/SuperShinyCaltropsofDOOM!.jpg
cards.name: Super Shiny Caltrops of DOOM!
cards.card-text:
When this card enters play, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 2 damage to the character.

If this card is put into a discard pile from play, you may pay 2. If you do, put it into play as a face-down resource under its owner's control instead.

MOVE
COST: Pay 2. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character if you can. (if you can't, this card remains in play)

FLIP UP: 2 [R]
cards.flavor: watch where you step

cards.set: Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview
cards.image: card_data/Shade of the Devoured Emperor Preview/JuiceCloset.jpg
cards.name: Juice Closet
cards.card-text: At the start of your turn you may pick a character. If you do, that character gains 1 strength this turn.
cards.flavor: not recommended for food storage To create a turgid, bloodthirsty maniac: just add juice!
